Docs.summary: Represents a message body that has been converted to a normalized value. The class is applicable for clients that target Exchange Online and versions of Exchange starting with Exchange Server 2013.

Docs.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the body of a message is in HTML or text format. The property is applicable for clients that target Exchange Online and versions of Exchange starting with Exchange Server 2013.
Docs.value: The type of the normalized body text.

Docs.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the text in a message body is truncated. The property is applicable for clients that target Exchange Online and versions of Exchange starting with Exchange Server 2013.
Docs.value: true if the body is truncated; otherwise, false.
